00253 void MainStack::switchWidget()
00254 {
00255     if(active == 0)
00256     {
00257         raiseWidget(1);
00258         active = 1;
00259         tasks.focusedButton->setFocus();
00260     }
00261     else
00262     {
00263         raiseWidget(0);
00264         active = 0;
00265         main.openDefaultButton->setFocus();
00266     }
00267 }
00268 
00269 bool MainStack::eventFilter(QObject *target, QEvent *event)
00270 {
00271     if(event->type() == QEvent::KeyPress)
00272     {
00273         QKeyEvent *keyEvent = (QKeyEvent *)event;
00274         if(keyEvent->key() == Key_F8 && active == 1)
00275         {
00276             closeClient();
00277             return true;
00278         }
00279     }
00280     if(event->type() == QEvent::FocusIn)
00281     {
00282     //    if(typeid(*target) == typeid(QPushButton))
00283         {
00284             ((QPushButton*)target)->setDefault(true);
00285             if(active == 1)
00286                 tasks.focusedButton = (QPushButton*)target;
00287         }
00288     }
00289     if(event->type() == QEvent::FocusOut)
00290     {
00291     //    if(typeid(*target) == typeid(QPushButton))
00292             ((QPushButton*)target)->setDefault(false);
00293     }
00294     if(event->type() == QEvent::Show)
00295     {
00296         if(active == 1)
00297             tasks.focusedButton->setFocus();
00298     }
00299     
00300     return QWidgetStack::eventFilter(target,event);
00301 }
00302 
00303 void MainStack::openDefault()
00304 {
00305     QString file = db->getCurDb();
00306 
00307     bool encrypted = false;
00308 
00309     if(file.right(4) == ".dbx")
00310     {
00311         file.truncate(file.length() - 4);
00312         encrypted = true;
00313     }
00314     else if(file.right(3) == ".db")
00315         file.truncate(file.length() - 3);
00316 
00317     QString password(QString::null);
00318 
00319     if(encrypted)
00320     {
00321         QDialog dialog2;
00322         dialog2.setCaption("Enter Password");
00323     
00324         QVBoxLayout vBoxLayout2(&dialog2);
00325         vBoxLayout2.setMargin(5);
00326         vBoxLayout2.setSpacing(5);
00327     
00328         QLabel label2("<nobr>This database is encrypted</nobr><br><nobr>Enter the password:</nobr>", &dialog2);
00329         QLineEdit password2(&dialog2);
00330         password2.setMaxLength(20);
00331         password2.setEchoMode(QLineEdit::Password);
00332         vBoxLayout2.addStretch();
00333         vBoxLayout2.addWidget(&label2);
00334         vBoxLayout2.addWidget(&password2);
00335         vBoxLayout2.addSpacing(10);
00336     
00337         QHBoxLayout hBoxLayout2(&vBoxLayout2);
00338         hBoxLayout2.setSpacing(5);
00339     
00340         QPushButton decryptButton2(QIconSet( QPixmap::fromMimeSource(ICON_PATH + "/decryptButton.png") ),
00341                                    "Open", &dialog2);
00342         connect(&decryptButton2, SIGNAL(clicked()), &dialog2, SLOT(accept()));
00343     
00344         QPushButton cancelButton2(QIconSet( QPixmap::fromMimeSource(ICON_PATH + "/cancelButton.png") ),
00345                                   "Cancel", &dialog2);
00346         connect(&cancelButton2, SIGNAL(clicked()), &dialog2, SLOT(reject()));
00347     
00348         hBoxLayout2.addStretch();
00349         hBoxLayout2.addWidget(&decryptButton2);
00350         hBoxLayout2.addWidget(&cancelButton2);
00351 
00352         while(dialog2.exec())
00353         {
00354             password = password2.text();
00355 
00356             if(db->openNew(file, password))
00357             {
00358                 clientOpened();
00359                 emit dbOpened();
00360                 break;
00361             }
00362         }
00363     }
00364     else
00365     {
00366         if(db->openNew(file, password))
00367         {
00368             clientOpened();
00369             emit dbOpened();
00370         }
00371     }
00372 }

00374 void MainStack::openNewDialog()
00375 {
00376     QDialog dialog;
00377     dialog.setCaption("Open Client");
00378     
00379     QVBoxLayout vBoxLayout(&dialog);
00380     vBoxLayout.setMargin(5);
00381     vBoxLayout.setSpacing(5);
00382     
00383     QLabel label("Choose a Client:", &dialog);
00384     vBoxLayout.addWidget(&label);
00385     
00386     QListBox listBox(&dialog);
00387     listBox.setFocus();
00388     listBox.insertStringList(db->getClientList());
00389     listBox.setSelected(0, true);
00390     connect(&listBox, SIGNAL(selected(QListBoxItem*)), &dialog, SLOT(accept()));
00391     
00392     vBoxLayout.addWidget(&listBox);
00393     vBoxLayout.addSpacing(10);
00394     
00395     QHBoxLayout hBoxLayout(&vBoxLayout);
00396     hBoxLayout.setSpacing(5);
00397     
00398     QPushButton okButton(QIconSet(QPixmap::fromMimeSource(ICON_PATH + "/openNewButton.png")), "Open", &dialog);
00399     okButton.setDefault(true);
00400     connect(&okButton, SIGNAL(clicked()), &dialog, SLOT(accept()));
00401     
00402     QPushButton cancelButton(QIconSet(QPixmap::fromMimeSource(ICON_PATH + "/cancelButton.png")), "Cancel", &dialog);
00403     connect(&cancelButton, SIGNAL(clicked()), &dialog, SLOT(reject()));
00404     
00405     hBoxLayout.addWidget(&okButton);
00406     hBoxLayout.addWidget(&cancelButton);
00407     
00408     if(dialog.exec() && listBox.count())
00409     {
00410         QString file = listBox.selectedItem()->text();
00411         file.remove(QRegExp(".+\\("));
00412 
00413         bool encrypted = false;
00414 
00415         if(file.right(5) == ".dbx)")
00416         {
00417             file.truncate(file.length() - 5);
00418             encrypted = true;
00419         }
00420         if(file.right(4) == ".db)")
00421             file.truncate(file.length() - 4);
00422 
00423         QString password(QString::null);
00424 
00425         if(encrypted)
00426         {
00427             QDialog dialog2;
00428             dialog2.setCaption("Enter Password");
00429     
00430             QVBoxLayout vBoxLayout2(&dialog2);
00431             vBoxLayout2.setMargin(5);
00432             vBoxLayout2.setSpacing(5);
00433     
00434             QLabel label2("<nobr>This database is encrypted</nobr><br><nobr>Enter the password:</nobr>", &dialog2);
00435             QLineEdit password2(&dialog2);
00436             password2.setMaxLength(20);
00437             password2.setEchoMode(QLineEdit::Password);
00438             vBoxLayout2.addStretch();
00439             vBoxLayout2.addWidget(&label2);
00440             vBoxLayout2.addWidget(&password2);
00441             vBoxLayout2.addSpacing(10);
00442     
00443             QHBoxLayout hBoxLayout2(&vBoxLayout2);
00444             hBoxLayout2.setSpacing(5);
00445     
00446             QPushButton decryptButton2(QIconSet( QPixmap::fromMimeSource(ICON_PATH + "/decryptButton.png") ),
00447                                       "Open", &dialog2);
00448             connect(&decryptButton2, SIGNAL(clicked()), &dialog2, SLOT(accept()));
00449     
00450             QPushButton cancelButton2(QIconSet( QPixmap::fromMimeSource(ICON_PATH + "/cancelButton.png") ),
00451                                      "Cancel", &dialog2);
00452             connect(&cancelButton2, SIGNAL(clicked()), &dialog2, SLOT(reject()));
00453     
00454             hBoxLayout2.addStretch();
00455             hBoxLayout2.addWidget(&decryptButton2);
00456             hBoxLayout2.addWidget(&cancelButton2);
00457 
00458             if(dialog2.exec())
00459                 password = password2.text();
00460         }
00461 
00462         if(db->openNew(file, password))
00463         {
00464             clientOpened();
00465             emit dbOpened();
00466         }
00467     }
00468 }

00470 void MainStack::createNewDialog()
00471 {
00472     QDialog dialog;
00473     dialog.setCaption("Create a New Client");
00474     
00475     QVBoxLayout vBoxLayout(&dialog);
00476     vBoxLayout.setMargin(5);
00477     vBoxLayout.setSpacing(5);
00478     
00479     QLabel labelName("Input the Client's Name:", &dialog);
00480     vBoxLayout.addWidget(&labelName);
00481     
00482     QLineEdit lineEdit(&dialog);
00483     lineEdit.setMaxLength(50);
00484     lineEdit.setFocus();
00485     vBoxLayout.addWidget(&lineEdit);
00486     
00487     QHBoxLayout hBoxYearEnd(&vBoxLayout);
00488     hBoxYearEnd.setSpacing(5);
00489 
00490     vBoxLayout.addSpacing(10);
00491     
00492     QLabel yearEndLabel("Year-End Date:", &dialog);
00493     QComboBox yearEndList(false, &dialog);
00494     QStringList yearEndStrings;
00495     yearEndStrings << "January 31" << "February 28" << "March 31" << "April 30"
00496             << "May 31" << "June 30" << "July 31" << "August 31" << "September 30"
00497             << "October 31" << "November 30" << "December 31";
00498     yearEndList.insertStringList(yearEndStrings);
00499     
00500     hBoxYearEnd.addWidget(&yearEndLabel);
00501     hBoxYearEnd.addWidget(&yearEndList);
00502     
00503     QHBoxLayout hBoxButtons(&vBoxLayout);
00504     hBoxButtons.setSpacing(5);
00505     
00506     QPushButton createButton(QIconSet(QPixmap::fromMimeSource(ICON_PATH + "/createNewButton.png")), "Create", &dialog);
00507     createButton.setDefault(true);
00508     connect(&createButton, SIGNAL(clicked()), &dialog, SLOT(accept()));
00509     
00510     QPushButton cancelButton(QIconSet(QPixmap::fromMimeSource(ICON_PATH + "/cancelButton.png")), "Cancel", &dialog);
00511     connect(&cancelButton, SIGNAL(clicked()), &dialog, SLOT(reject()));
00512     
00513     hBoxButtons.addStretch();
00514     hBoxButtons.addWidget(&createButton);
00515     hBoxButtons.addWidget(&cancelButton);
00516     
00517     if(dialog.exec() && !lineEdit.text().isEmpty())
00518     {
00519         if(db->createNew(lineEdit.text(), yearEndList.currentText()))
00520         {
00521             clientOpened();
00522             emit dbOpened();
00523         }
00524     }
00525 }

00527 void MainStack::editName()
00528 {
00529     QDialog dialog;
00530     dialog.setCaption("Edit Client Name");
00531 
00532     QVBoxLayout vBoxLayout(&dialog);
00533     vBoxLayout.setMargin(5);
00534     vBoxLayout.setSpacing(5);
00535 
00536     QLabel label("Input a new client name:", &dialog);
00537 
00538     vBoxLayout.addWidget(&label);
00539 
00540     QLineEdit lineEdit(db->getCurClient(), &dialog);
00541     lineEdit.setMaxLength(50);
00542     lineEdit.setFocus();
00543 
00544     vBoxLayout.addWidget(&lineEdit);
00545     vBoxLayout.addSpacing(10);
00546 
00547     QHBoxLayout hBoxLayout(&vBoxLayout);
00548 
00549     QPushButton okButton(QIconSet(QPixmap::fromMimeSource(ICON_PATH + "/editNameButton.png")),
00550                          "Change Name", &dialog);
00551     connect(&okButton, SIGNAL(clicked()), &dialog, SLOT(accept()));
00552 
00553     QPushButton cancelButton(QIconSet(QPixmap::fromMimeSource(ICON_PATH + "/cancelButton.png")),
00554                              "Cancel", &dialog);
00555     connect(&cancelButton, SIGNAL(clicked()), &dialog, SLOT(reject()));
00556 
00557     cancelButton.setDefault(false);
00558     okButton.setDefault(true);
00559 
00560     hBoxLayout.addStretch();
00561     hBoxLayout.addWidget(&okButton);
00562     hBoxLayout.addWidget(&cancelButton);
00563 
00564     if( dialog.exec() && !(lineEdit.text().isEmpty()))
00565         db->editName(lineEdit.text());
00566 
00567     main.openDefaultButton->setText("Open " + db->getCurClient());
00568     emit nameChanged();
00569 }

00571 void MainStack::copyClient()
00572 {

00574             exportPath,
00575             "Client Database (*.db *.dbx)",
00576             this,
00577             0,
00578             "Copy Client Database to File");
00579     
00580     if(!file.isEmpty())
00581         db->copyDb(file);

00609 void MainStack::encrypt()
00610 {
00611     QDialog dialog;
00612     dialog.setCaption("Encrypt Database");
00613     
00614     QVBoxLayout vBoxLayout(&dialog);
00615     vBoxLayout.setMargin(5);
00616     vBoxLayout.setSpacing(5);
00617     
00618     QHBoxLayout hBoxTop(&vBoxLayout);
00619     hBoxTop.setSpacing(5);
00620     
00621     QLabel label1("Input a password:", &dialog);
00622     QLineEdit password1(&dialog);
00623     password1.setMaxLength(20);
00624     password1.setEchoMode(QLineEdit::Password);
00625     hBoxTop.addStretch();
00626     hBoxTop.addWidget(&label1);
00627     hBoxTop.addWidget(&password1);
00628     
00629     QHBoxLayout hBoxMiddle(&vBoxLayout);
00630     hBoxMiddle.setSpacing(5);
00631 
00632     vBoxLayout.addSpacing(10);
00633     
00634     QLabel label2("Repeat:", &dialog);
00635     QLineEdit password2(&dialog);
00636     password2.setMaxLength(20);
00637     password2.setEchoMode(QLineEdit::Password);
00638     hBoxMiddle.addStretch();
00639     hBoxMiddle.addWidget(&label2);
00640     hBoxMiddle.addWidget(&password2);
00641     
00642     QHBoxLayout hBoxBottom(&vBoxLayout);
00643     hBoxBottom.setSpacing(5);
00644     
00645     QPushButton encryptButton(QIconSet( QPixmap::fromMimeSource(ICON_PATH + "/encryptButton.png") ),
00646                               "Encrypt", &dialog);
00647     connect(&encryptButton, SIGNAL(clicked()), &dialog, SLOT(accept()));
00648     
00649     QPushButton cancelButton(QIconSet( QPixmap::fromMimeSource(ICON_PATH + "/cancelButton.png") ),
00650                              "Cancel", &dialog);
00651     connect(&cancelButton, SIGNAL(clicked()), &dialog, SLOT(reject()));
00652     
00653     hBoxBottom.addStretch();
00654     hBoxBottom.addWidget(&encryptButton);
00655     hBoxBottom.addWidget(&cancelButton);
00656     
00657     while(dialog.exec())
00658     {
00659         if(password1.text() == password2.text())
00660         {
00661             db->encryptDb(password1.text());
00662             clientOpened();
00663             break;
00664         }
00665     }
00666 }
00667 
00668 void MainStack::decrypt()
00669 {
00670     QDialog dialog;
00671     dialog.setCaption("Decrypt Database");
00672 
00673     QVBoxLayout vBoxLayout(&dialog);
00674     vBoxLayout.setMargin(5);
00675     vBoxLayout.setSpacing(5);
00676 
00677     QLabel label("<nobr>Are you sure you want to decrypt the database?</nobr>", &dialog);
00678 
00679     vBoxLayout.addWidget(&label);
00680     vBoxLayout.addSpacing(10);
00681 
00682     QHBoxLayout hBoxLayout(&vBoxLayout);
00683     hBoxLayout.setSpacing(5);
00684 
00685     QPushButton decryptButton(QIconSet(QPixmap::fromMimeSource(ICON_PATH + "/decryptButton.png")),
00686                               "Decrypt", &dialog);
00687     connect(&decryptButton, SIGNAL(clicked()), &dialog, SLOT(accept()));
00688     decryptButton.setDefault(false);
00689 
00690     QPushButton cancelButton(QIconSet(QPixmap::fromMimeSource(QString(ICON_PATH + "/cancelButton.png"))),
00691                              "Cancel", &dialog);
00692     connect(&cancelButton, SIGNAL(clicked()), &dialog, SLOT(reject()));
00693     cancelButton.setDefault(true);
00694 
00695     hBoxLayout.addStretch();
00696     hBoxLayout.addWidget(&decryptButton);
00697     hBoxLayout.addWidget(&cancelButton);
00698 
00699     if(dialog.exec())
00700     {
00701         db->decryptDb();
00702         clientOpened();
00703     }
00704 }
00705 
00706 void MainStack::closeClient()
00707 {
00708     if(active == 0)
00709         return;
00710 
00711     if(!(db->journalTmpEmpty()))
00712     {
00713         CloseDialog dialog;
00714         dialog.exec();
00715 
00716         switch(dialog.result())
00717         {
00718             case 0:
00719                 emit saveAndClearJournalTmp();
00720                 break;
00721             case 1:
00722                 break;
00723             case 2:
00724                 emit switchToJournal();
00725                 return;
00726                 break;
00727             default:
00728                 break;
00729         }
00730     }
00731 
00732     db->closeDb();
00733     switchWidget();
00734     emit dbClosed();
00735 }
00736 
00737 void MainStack::prepareQuit()
00738 {
00739     if(active == 1)
00740         closeClient();
00741     emit quit();
00742 }
